extension.description: Spotify add-on for XBMC using native XBMC menus. It allows searching for tracks, listing: playlists, artist albums, album tracks, starred tracks and playing and queueing tracks, albums etc. It can be operated via mobile client like Yatse.

extension.summary: SBT Videos plugin fetches videos from the brazilian SBT tv network and opens them on XBMC
O plugin SBT Videos busca os todos os vÃ­deos do site do SBT para tocÃ¡-los no XBMC
O plugin SBT Videos busca os todos os vÃ­deos do site do SBT para tocÃ¡-los no XBMC
extension.description: SBT Videos plugin fetches videos from the brazilian SBT tv network and opens them on XBMC.[CR] This plugin uses Google Analytics to help me decide see what people are using so I can better decide what should I develop on next updates. The exact events that are tracked are:[CR] * Track when user installs the plugin[CR] * Track when user uses the plugin (sees the Main Menu)[CR] * Track what video category people see the most[CR] * Track when user choose to play one video (not which video)[CR] * Track when user choose to play the whole episode (not which episode)[CR][CR] If you have any questions, feedback, want to report a bug, or just say hello. Please visit the official plugin thread at [http://forum.kodi.tv/showthread.php?tid=218591]

Mit diesem Programm verwaltet man seine cdARTs. Man kann cdARTs von fanart.tv.com herunterladen, ein Backup von seinen cdARTs erstellen, cdARTS anzeigen und lokale cdARTs lÃ¶schen.
Met dit script kun je je cdARTs beheren. Je kunt cdARTs downloaden van fanart.tv, een backup maken, cdARTs bekijken en je eigen cdARTS verwijderen.
